Name: Art de Vivre (Art of Living)
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Cognac freshened and flavoured with Mastiha, Fernet Branca and chocolate bitters.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Thanos Prunarus at Baba Au Rum, Athens. Originally with 50ml Martell Cordon Bleu cognac.
Nutrition: One serving of Art de Vivre (Art of Living) contains 156 calories
